name: Menari diperapian | Meta Visual Poetry series [3]
description:
This poem is the embodiment when a human soul is at its lowest point.  all thoughts enter causing confusion that makes us lose control.  Emptiness, depression, anxiety, are factors that lead to hopelessness for the life that is being lived.  all meaningless actions, all expectations poisoned with inferiority.  This poem is written in Indonesian.  To make it easier for you, I provide a translation in English.  maybe this English does not cover the whole meaning (because of the difference in meaning equivalent), but hopefully the essence of this poem is conveyed.

Dancing In the Fireplace

3. 
Anxiety overtakes this whole body
When your fingers no longer dance between my body
Why u give anxiety on the veranda if it is silence
Does silence actually guarantee letters that were never addressed? 

Like it or not 
Grief over this loss will settle into a wound
It will also cause the arteries throughout the body to stretch
When grief hurts feelings
And the twilight came as the closing of the old days
Ending a life lived with regret and disappointment;
The day of vengeance has come.

-arifansdr- 2017.
